mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, view) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, moddate = now() WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT board.bno, title, board.regdate, view, ifnull(files.bno,0) as files FROM board board LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT bno FROM files) files on files.bno = board.bno ORDER BY bno DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{size}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO files (bno, filename, uuid) VALUES (#{bno}, #{filename}, #{uuid})
